Module swan.g09.cs230a2

Class Layer<T>

java.lang.Object
swan.g09.cs230a2.Layer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of Tile to fill the class
public class Layer<T> extends Object
The Layer class handles an individual layer of Tile subclasses.
